features: Lengthening Mascara: This volumizing washable mascara formula is infused with bamboo extract and fibers for long, full and lightweight lashes that don't flake or smudge

Lash Extension Brush: Features our exclusive Flex Tower mascara brush that bends to volumize and extend every single lash from root to tip; Ophthalmologist and allergy tested, suitable for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers
It's All in the Eyes: Subtle lines, smokey vibes, custom brow looks, classic tones or a shot of color; Our eyeshadow, eyeliner, brows and mascara collections are designed to transform your look

Create any look with Maybelline; foundation, BB creams, concealers, and setting powders for the perfect canvas, eye shadows, mascara, brow pencils, and eyeliners for any eye look and lip products, from showstopping lipstick to plumping lip gloss
body.description: Sky high lash impact from Every angle! Lash Sensational Sky High mascara delivers full volume and limitless length. Exclusive flex tower mascara brush bends to volumize and extend every single lash from root to tip. Washable mascara formula infused with Bamboo Extract and fibers for long, full lashes that never gets weighed down. Available in very Black and Blackest Black. Allergy tested. Ophthalmologist tested. Suitable for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers. Removes easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’m very happy with this mascara. It doubled the length of my lashes without looking clumpy or feeling dry, and looks natural at the same time. It was super easy to apple, and the packaging just feels expensive. Maybelline really did invest a lot into the product. The wand actually curls lashes a bit on its own, and is sturdy. This mascara gets every last lash on the first swipe. Truly the best mascara. Only con is it’s hard to remove.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am a 59-year-old female and have been wearing mascara for like ever. I try to get a mascara that I can afford, stays on but is easy to remove....but....but lengthens those lashes. This stuff was selected because it is super budget-friendly, and the lengthening of my lashes is amazing. This is my new go to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Acabo de recibirla, me la probé y es MARAVILLOSA, creo un efecto grosor y además alarga. Es fantástica!Tengo aprox 10 años usando telescopic de L’Oréal y no había conseguido reemplazo, pero esta la superó y por menos de la mitad del precio. La amé

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Blackest Black dries stiff and clumps vs Very Black
reviews.reviewText: For reference, I have very fine and relatively sparse lashes which show clumps VERY easily. They also tend to get weighed down by heavy/wet formulas e.g. Bare minerals mascara. I have tried this washable mascara in two shades: Very Black (the lightest black) and Blackest Black (the darkest black, I think). Blackest Black feels very different on the lashes; while the darker color does give more dramatic oomph to the lashes, it's heavier, dries more stiffly, and is prone to a bit of clumping. I have to be more careful when applying it to avoid the "spider leg" look. In comparison, the Very Black feels like a completely different formula. It goes on like a dream, separates my fine lashes, and gives them amazing length without weighing them down. Clumps are rare, and the few that do happen are small and I can easily go in and nudge them out with my fingernail. When the mascara has fully dried, my lashes never feel stiff; they still feel very touchable. I would say it gives me medium volume. This is the kind of mascara that I'd describe as "my lashes, but better", a very defined eye look that pushes the boundary of natural. It's also very easy to remove. Sometimes I rub my lashes gently in the shower so the warm water can start dissolving it, and then after my shower I follow it up with makeup remover and then facial wash. I think Very Black is my HG mascara!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Truly SENSATIONAL! My new fave mascara!!
reviews.reviewText: Wow -- I have tried SO many mascaras and this one is by far the best I've used in many years! Love the length, and especially the fact that it goes on so cleanly, and there's NO clumps!! Love, love, love!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I will never not use this mascara
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this mascara! It's not clumpy and seems to lengthen out my lashes. Works way better than the expensive mascaras that I've had in the past. Do yourself a favor and try this one out!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have tried quite a few different mascaras and so far this is my favorite. The brush separates and coats without clumping. It works so well for me!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lengthens and does not smear
reviews.reviewText: I fell asleep without removing the mascara from my lashes and did not wake up with raccoon eyes. A definite plus! It definitely lengthens my lashes and looks great! I do have to run over my lashes a few times after applying with a separate wand. I have thin eyelashes, and the wand holds a lot of product that tends to "cake" on top. A few brushes with a separate wand does the trick though.

reviews.reviewTitle: ão é à prova dágua, mas não borra.
reviews.reviewText: boa durabilidade, bom alonamento e não borra.Não é à prova dágua, mas mesmo depois de um dia de trabalho e de uma boa aula de crossfit, chega em casa intacta.
Me encantó todo, no arden ojos ynlas pestañas wuedan separadas y no se baja

reviews.reviewTitle: Lashes to Envy: Maybelline Volumizing and Lengthening Mascara
reviews.reviewText: Maybelline Volumizing and Lengthening Mascara has become my go-to beauty essential, transforming my lashes into a show-stopping feature that I can't help but flaunt. This innovative mascara lives up to its promise of delivering sky-high lashes, and I am thoroughly impressed with its lightweight formula, impeccable performance, and stunning results.One of the standout features of this mascara is its ability to add both volume and length to my lashes effortlessly. The specially designed brush captures even the tiniest lashes, coating them evenly with the rich, jet-black formula. With just a few strokes, my lashes appear dramatically fuller, longer, and more defined, creating a mesmerizing effect that accentuates my eyes and adds depth to my overall look.What sets this mascara apart is its lightweight formula. Despite its impressive volumizing and lengthening abilities, the mascara feels weightless on my lashes. There's no clumping, heaviness, or discomfort, allowing me to wear it throughout the day without any irritation. The formula dries quickly, ensuring that my lashes stay lifted and perfectly curled without smudging or flaking.I appreciate the versatility of this mascara. Whether I'm going for a natural, everyday look or a glamorous, night-out style, this mascara adapts beautifully. With a single coat, my lashes look subtly enhanced for a natural appearance. For a more dramatic effect, I can easily build up the intensity with additional coats, creating a bold and eye-catching allure.Furthermore, Maybelline Volumizing and Lengthening Mascara is long-lasting and resistant to smudging. It withstands the challenges of a busy day, including sweat and humidity, ensuring that my lashes remain flawless from morning to night. The mascara is also effortless to remove, making the end-of-day cleanup hassle-free.In summary, Maybelline Volumizing and Lengthening Mascara have exceeded my expectations, providing exceptional results that rival high-end mascaras at a fraction of the price. Its ability to deliver sky-high lashes, lightweight feel, and long-lasting performance make it a standout product in the world of beauty. Whether you're a makeup enthusiast or someone seeking an everyday mascara that delivers outstanding results, Maybelline Volumizing and Lengthening Mascara is a game-changer. Prepare to be amazed as your lashes are transformed into a voluminous, lengthened masterpiece that adds a touch of allure and sophistication to your overall appearance. Highly recommended for anyone desiring the perfect flutter of lashes that commands attention and admiration.

Deja las pestañas altisimas, bien separadas y sin grumos( hasta ahorita), no escurre. Dura todo el dia, y no es facil de quitar. ( siempre tengo que pasar un desmaquillante de aceite) . De las unicas que últimamente no me ha dado alergia en los ojos.He comprado marcas muchisimos mas caras en donde no aguanto con loa ojos llorosos y ardiendo.Esa, de verdad, me sorprendió
